io.dropwizard.grpc.server

Class DropwizardServerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.grpc.ServerBuilder
      • io.dropwizard.grpc.server.DropwizardServerBuilder

  • public final class DropwizardServerBuilder
extends io.grpc.ServerBuilder
    ServerBuilder decorator which adds the resulting Server instance to the environment' lifecycle.
